participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, often reflecting on his past experiences.
participant_1.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: energetic and cheerful, always looking for fun and adventure.
participant_2.background: i am 13 years old. my brother is older than me. i ride the bus to school. i am on the soccer team.
